song.title: Life's A Loop
song.info:
Fixed up: Subi/Desire 8/2/93 ------- PT1.1B --------------------- Vocals by TTF & DF --------------------- I fancied doing ano- ther piano anthem... When is someone going to fix that bug which causes any sample with a repeat to fuck up when played at A#3 pitch? It's bloody a- nnoying! Fave record now is Eskimos&Egypt - "Fall From Grace". --------------------- Sam Brown, 4 Carbery Close, Oadby Grange, Leicester, LE2-4TA, England! Or EMail on: U1B43CC.KEELE.AC.UK --------------------- .: :.
. .
------- -- Subi!
